lead_paragraph: Christin Myles of Chino, Calif., has accused Marshall of punching her in the face outside the club in March 2012 and is seeking unspecified damages.

headline.print_headline: Jets’ Marshall Testifies at Civil Trial
headline.main: Jets’ Brandon Marshall Testifies at Civil Trial

snippet: Christin Myles of Chino, Calif., has accused Marshall of punching her in the face outside the club in March 2012 and is seeking unspecified damages.
